title: Beth and Duane Chapman: See the emotional moment they learned her cancer returned
text:
(CNN) Beth Chapman's final TV series debuted Wednesday, and it's already proven to be an emotional ride.

WGN began airing "Dog's Most Wanted" featuring Chapman and her husband, Duane "Dog" Chapman.

The series focuses on the Chapmans, who have long been bounty hunters, and a team known as "The Dirty Dozen" who were working with them to track down fugitives.

But with the death of Beth Chapman at the age of 51 in in June after battling throat cancer, viewers will also watch this season as that family grapples with her illness.

In a clip from the show, the Chapmans are seen receiving the bad news that a tumor she has has not been responding to treatment.

Read More
description: Beth Chapman's final TV series debuted Wednesday, and it's already proven to be an emotional ride.
